sentences.sContent: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.sCn: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠,伸了伸懒腰。
锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

sentences.sContent: Ann stretched across the couch and grabbed the phone.
sentences.sCn: 安向长沙发那头探过身，抓起电话。

sentences.sContent: The ski instructor showed us some special stretches.
sentences.sCn: 滑雪教练给我们示范了几个特别的伸展动作。

phrases.pCn: 伸懒腰；伸展身体；尽最大的努力
拉弯，拉伸弯曲；伸张弯曲
冲刺阶段；（跑道的）终点直道（等于home straight）

trans.tranOther: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
the action of stretching a part of your body out to its full length, or a particular way of doing this
